name: Nelsons Nightmare: Remastered
description:
It's happening again.  That same nightmare.  Nelson will never get any sleep.  Help him get SOME zzz's by staying asleep as long as possible.  

wasd or arrow keys to move

move to aim/fire

See how many rounds you can survive before the inevitable.  Be sure to check out the shop for some sweet upgrades!

Created in 72hrs for Ludum Dare 50.  Code/Art by clemonades.  Music/sfx by Joel Steudler
